schools.title: #2 BEST PRIVATE SCHOOL IN GHANA
schools.name: Galaxy Int'l School
schools.description: Galaxy International School is an international school located in Accra, Ghana. The school was established in 2001 to provide day and boarding facilities to children living in Ghana and children of foreign-based families and Ghanaians living outside Ghana.

schools.title: #3 BEST PRIVATE SCHOOL IN GHANA
schools.name: American Int'l School
schools.description: AIS is a melting pot of cultures, talents, and ideas. We cherish and celebrate the diversity that enriches our learning environment. Together, we create an inclusive space where everyone feels valued and appreciated.

schools.title: #1 BEST HIGH SCHOOL IN GHANA
schools.name: Wesley Girls' High School
schools.description: Wesley Girls' High School, Cape Coast, was established in 1836 with 25 girls, by the wife of a Methodist Minister. It started as a primary school with the aim of offering girls proper training in reading and writing, sewing and housekeeping and more especially training in moral and spiritual development.

schools.title: #6 BEST HIGH SCHOOL IN GHANA
schools.name: St. John's School
schools.description: St. John's School is an all-boys' second-cycle Roman Catholic school located at Sekondi in the Western Region of Ghana.

schools.title: #10 BEST PRIMARY SCHOOL IN GHANA
schools.name: M.A School
schools.description: M.A School is a government-type school located in the heart of Nsawam, in the Eastern Region of Ghana

schools.title: #5 BEST PUBLIC SCHOOL IN GHANA
schools.name: Notre Dame Girls Senior High
schools.description: Notre Dame Girls Senior High School was established in 1987 as a private school by the School Sisters of Notre Dame

schools.title: #9 BEST HIGH SCHOOL IN GHANA
schools.name: Bimbilla Senior High School
schools.description: Bimbilla Senior High was established in 1981 as a day school with Mr. L.T. Tingbani as the headmaster. The school is a mixed school and has produced prominent people such as army officers, coordinating directors.

schools.title: #7 BEST PUBLIC SHS IN GHANA
schools.name: Bolgatanga Senior High School
schools.description: Bolgatanga Senior High School (Big BOSS) is situated in Winkogo, about 8km south of Bolgatanga, the Upper East regional capital.

schools.title: #9 BEST PUBLIC SHS IN GHANA
schools.name: Abutia Senior High
schools.description: Abutia Senior High Technical is one of the senior high schools in VOLTA Region at Abutia of Ho West district.
